name: Ecosystem Evolution Protocol
title: Ecosystem Evolution Protocol
description: Formal protocol for the evolution and promotion of agentic assets from experimental to core.

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Each promotion stage requires documented verification from WQSS.
axiomAlignment.A2_user_primacy: The user retains final authorization for experimental skill promotion.
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Promotion criteria and logs are visible throughout the ecosystem.
axiomAlignment.A4_non_harm: Experimental skills are strictly constrained to non-critical loops.
axiomAlignment.A5_consistency: Evolution follows a standardized bi-weekly governance review cycle.

governance_promotion_cycle.description: Standardized bi-weekly cycle for auditing new skills and promoting them to validated or core status.
governance_promotion_cycle.use_when: When managing the growth and stabilization of the agentic skill library.
governance_promotion_cycle.code_example: # promotion_cycle logic implemented in symphony logs and registry audits
best_practices: Verify skills in at least 3 distinct scenarios before promotion.
Ensure WQSS review is complete and documented.
Maintain a clear audit trail for every promotion decision.
Use experimental flags for all newly ingested skills.
anti_patterns: Promoting untested experimental skills directly to core.
Ignoring axiom violation logs during the validation phase.
